description: Numerators of coefficients of expansion of arctan(x)^2 = x^2 - 2/3*x^4 + 23/45*x^6 - 44/105*x^8 + 563/1575*x^10 - 3254/10395*x^12 + ...
comments: |a(n)| = numerator of Sum_{k=1..n} 1/(n(2k-1)).Let f(x)=(1/2)*log((1+sqrt(x))/(1-sqrt(x))) and c(n) = int(f(x)*x^(n-1),x=0..1), then for n>=1, c(n) = |a(n+1)|/A071968(n) and (f(x))^2 = sum(c(n)*x^n,n=1..infinity). - _Roland Groux_, Dec 14 2010
references: A. Fletcher, J. C. P. Miller, L. Rosenhead and L. J. Comrie, An Index of Mathematical Tables. Vols. 1 and 2, 2nd ed., Blackwell, Oxford and Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, 1962, Vol. 1, p. 89.
H. A. Rothe, in C. F. Hindenburg, editor, Sammlung Combinatorisch-Analytischer Abhandlungen, Vol. 2, Chap. XI. Fleischer, Leipzig, 1800, p. 313.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
mathematica: a[n_] := (-1)^(n+1)*Sum[1/(n*(2*k-1)), {k, 1, n}] // Numerator; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 21}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 04 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Apr 09 2002
